alert.note: Alert for Martin; St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 4:22PM EDT until July 31 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern St. Lucie County in east central Florida... Northeastern Martin County in east central Florida... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 422 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Witham Field, or over Stuart, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Port Saint Lucie, Walton, Stuart, Palm City, and Port Salerno. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
